item.title: Lumberjack Lake Expansion (Idaho) v1.0 1.54 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 28, 2025

Lumberjack Lake Expansion (Idaho) v1.0 1.54 ATS

Welcome to Lumberjack Lake! This map expansion is located in Northern Idaho near Grangeville. This expansion features a yard with garage, repair and sleep triggers as well as a logging site and a mine for jobs.

Bottom of mod order!
Compatible with ATS 1.54.x

Credits: MattVT

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Promods-More Europe Cities(Switzerland) RC v1.1 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 28, 2025

Promods-More Europe Cities(Switzerland) RC v1.1 1.54 ETS2

Connecting Mulhouse and Basel for promods and more European cities (Switzerland).But it does not connect to other conflicting parts and needs to be used with other mods

Needs:
Sud De France
Rhineland Map – ProMods RC

Dependents:
Promods
More Europe Cities(Switzerland)

Load Order:
Fld Patch
Promods-More Europe Cities(Switzerland) RC
Rhineland Map – ProMods RC
Rhineland Map Fix
Rhineland Map
Sud De France
more European cities (Switzerland)
IMP Promods Addon [Optional]
IMP [Optional]
Promods

Precautions:
IMP has CTD If you don’t have fix
IMP is not necessary, but it is a suggested order for players who want to install IMP.
More Europe Cities(Switzerland) can not coexist with other Swiss expansions.

Credits: Jatuo

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.

item.title: Police Chase Mod v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 28, 2025

Police Chase Mod v1.0 ETS2

Advanced mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 that adds a realistic police chase system and intelligent fine system. The mod analyzes fault in accidents and issues fines only when the player has actually committed a violation.

Main Features
Police Chase System
Dynamic chases: Police react to player violations in real-time
Different chase levels: 1-5 star system depending on violation severity
Realistic police AI: Police vehicles behave realistically during chases
Siren and radio communication system: Adds immersion to gameplay
Option to escape or surrender: Player can try to escape or surrender to police

Intelligent Fine System
Accident fault analysis: System determines who caused the accident
Fines only for own fault: Player receives fine ONLY when they caused the accident
No fines for others’ mistakes: If accident was caused by another AI driver, player receives no penalty
Points system: Determines degree of fault (0-100%)
Appeal option: Player can appeal fines

Installation Requirements
Euro Truck Simulator 2 version 1.53 or newer
Mods enabled in game settings
Option 1: Ready .scs file (Recommended)
Download ready mod: ETS2_Police_Chase_Mod.scs

Copy to mod folder:
Windows: Documents/Euro Truck Simulator 2/mod/
Linux: ~/.local/share/Euro Truck Simulator 2/mod/
macOS: ~/Library/Application Support/Euro Truck Simulator 2/mod/

Activate in game:
Launch ETS2
Go to “Mod Manager”
Find “Police Chase & Smart Fine System”
Click “Subscribe” or “Enable”

Credits: leviathan

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Real SCS AI Country Spawns v1.4 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 28, 2025

Real SCS AI Country Spawns v1.4 ETS2

NEWS:
– Added BONUS CAR TRAILER.
– Resized Kia Ceed SW and Skoda Octavia II.
– Little fixes and improvements.

This mod sets all SCS cars to REAL SPAWNS BY COUNTRY they appear in. Every country has custom setting of all cars spawning, according to the real traffic and car brands popularity. Spawns follow also country’s wealth, which means no more luxury cars on every corner in less wealthy countries like Romania or Macedonia for example. I studied those countries using sells statistics and dashcam videos from most countries, this is actually result of several years of work and constant improving.

Countries with spawns set are all SCS countries. Add-on also supports and set spawns for these map mods: Promods, Promods Middle-East, Promods Great Steppe, Road to Asia and Road To Africa (by Terramaps), Java Road Revolution map (= Indonesia map), Maghreb map mod (North part of Africa), Heart of Africa and Horn of Africa maps.

Of course, some country spawns are rather improvised due to limitations of SCS AI cars variety, especially in Africa or Asia, but I still tried to make them as close to reality as I could.

REAL COLOURS:
– Added real colours for all SCS cars! Colours follow their real popularity, so expect more grey, silver, red and blue cars in traffic, while yellow and green are made to be rare (if the car had it available). Vans spawn mostly in white colours.

List of fixes:
– Resized Kia Ceed SW and Skoda Octavia II
– Added black pillars for Peugeot 3008
– Added black C-pillar for Citroen C5 Tourer
– Fixed lampmasks for Fiat Ducato van and VW Passat B8 Variant
– Little improved lamps texture for VW Golf V
– Mercedes-Benz W124 has fully coloured car body now

Wheel changes:
– Changed wheels for Peugeot Boxer flatbed van, Skoda Superb both liftback and station wagon, VW Touran, Skoda Fabia I, Mercedes-Benz W124, Alfa Romeo Giulietta and Kia Cee’d SW.

New features:
– Added my custom car trailer.
– Unlocked boat trailer for SUVs and vans to haul in traffic.
– Service vans VW Transporter and Ford Transit now have the same shade of orange as lift platform Fiat Ducato, to fit in together.
– Expensive or modern cars have xenon/LED lights shade on road surface.

This version is compatible with ETS2 version 1.54.

Credits: Egon, SCS

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Egyptian-Libyan Gateway v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 28, 2025

Egyptian-Libyan Gateway v1.0 ETS2

This mod significantly expands the road network in North Africa by adding new cities and delivery opportunities in Libya and Egypt. Explore new routes and extend your trucking adventures across the Mediterranean.

Requirements
All map DLCs required by ProMods are also required for this mod to work properly.

Content:
Misrata
Syrte
Ajdabiya
Benghazi
Al Bayda
Tobruk
Matruh
As Sallum
Alexandria

Game version: 1.54

Credits: BigRigBoss
